mapper.select: select count(*) from member where user_status=0
select a.* from (select rownum rn, m.* from member m where user_status=0 order by rn ) a where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: Update member set user_status=-1 where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where user_id=#{id}

select n.*,an.com_id, a.app_sts,b.user_id as apply_id, b.res_code, an.anno_title, rc.res_code as read_res from notice n,announce an,apply a,apply b,resume_contect rc where n.anno_code = an.anno_code(+) and n.ntc_code = a.user_ntc_code(+) and n.ntc_code = b.com_ntc_code(+) and n.ntc_code = rc.ntc_code(+) and n.user_id=#{id} order by n.ntc_time
